mapper.select: SELECT p.orderNum, p.mNum, c.mType, p.orderState, s.finalPrice, p.orderName, d.deliverystate FROM orderProduct p JOIN store s ON p.orderNum = s.orderNum JOIN client c ON p.mNum = c.mNum LEFT OUTER JOIN delivery d ON s.orderNum = d.orderNum

SELECT p.orderNum, p.mNum, p.orderState, p.orderName, p.orderTel, p.orderEmail, TO_CHAR(s.sDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') sDate, s.sDelivCharge, s.sZip, s.sAddr1, s.sAddr2, aMilePrice, s.finalPrice, d.deliveryState FROM orderProduct p JOIN store s ON p.orderNum = s.orderNum JOIN delivery d ON s.orderNum = d.orderNum JOIN addedMileage m ON s.aMileNum = m.aMileNum WHERE p.orderNum = #{orderNum}
UPDATE delivery SET deliveryState = 1 WHERE orderNum=#{orderNum}
UPDATE delivery SET deliveryState = 2 WHERE orderNum=#{orderNum}
